languages.text: "Навигаторы извлекли пользу для Империума из вашего нечестивого существования. Учитывая статус Навис Нобилите и прочие обстоятельства, я бы не назвал произошедшее нарушением Лекс Империалис".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Cassia's second quest (the truth about the xenos source of Orsellio powers).
Yrliet: "For generations, the three-eyed mon-keigh have abused the souls of the Children of Asuryan for their own petty ambitions. What is that if not evidence of spiritual wretchedness?"

traits.locale_text: "Навигаторы извлекли пользу для Империума из вашего нечестивого существования. Учитывая статус Навис Нобилите и прочие обстоятельства, я бы не назвал произошедшее нарушением Лекс Империалис".

languages.text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Cassia's second quest (the truth about the xenos source of Orsellio powers).
Yrliet: "For generations, the three-eyed mon-keigh have abused the souls of the Children of Asuryan for their own petty ambitions. What is that if not evidence of spiritual wretchedness?"
languages.original_text: "Навигаторы извлекли пользу для Империума из вашего нечестивого существования. Учитывая статус Навис Нобилите и прочие обстоятельства, я бы не назвал произошедшее нарушением Лекс Империалис".

traits.locale_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

"The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

languages.text: 「航宙士たちは、お前の不浄な存在を帝国の利益に転じる方法を見いだした。航宙貴族の地位とその他の事情を考慮すると、これはレックス・インペリアへの違反とは見なさない」
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: 「航宙士たちは、お前の不浄な存在を帝国の利益に転じる方法を見いだした。航宙貴族の地位とその他の事情を考慮すると、これはレックス・インペリアへの違反とは見なさない」

languages.text: "Die Navigatoren haben einen Weg gefunden, wie das Imperium von Eurer unheiligen Existenz profitieren kann. Wenn man den Status der Navis Nobilite sowie andere Umstände berücksichtigt, würde ich das nicht als Verstoß gegen das Lex Imperia werten."
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Die Navigatoren haben einen Weg gefunden, wie das Imperium von Eurer unheiligen Existenz profitieren kann. Wenn man den Status der Navis Nobilite sowie andere Umstände berücksichtigt, würde ich das nicht als Verstoß gegen das Lex Imperia werten."

languages.text: « Les navigateurs ont réussi à trouver une utilité à votre existence impie pour le bien de l'Imperium. Compte tenu du statut de la Navis Nobilite et d'autres circonstances, je ne peux pas considérer ceci comme une violation de la Lex Imperialis. »
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: « Les navigateurs ont réussi à trouver une utilité à votre existence impie pour le bien de l'Imperium. Compte tenu du statut de la Navis Nobilite et d'autres circonstances, je ne peux pas considérer ceci comme une violation de la Lex Imperialis. »

languages.text: «Los navegantes han hallado el modo de que el Imperium se beneficie de su impía existencia. Teniendo en cuenta el estatus de la Navis Nobilite y demás circunstancias atenuantes, no lo considero una afrenta contra la Lex Imperialis».
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: «Los navegantes han hallado el modo de que el Imperium se beneficie de su impía existencia. Teniendo en cuenta el estatus de la Navis Nobilite y demás circunstancias atenuantes, no lo considero una afrenta contra la Lex Imperialis».

languages.text: “那些导航者找到了某种方法，可以让你们这些邪恶的渣滓为帝国带来利益。考虑到导航宗族的重要性与其他因素，我并不认为这种做法违背了帝国的律法。”
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: “那些导航者找到了某种方法，可以让你们这些邪恶的渣滓为帝国带来利益。考虑到导航宗族的重要性与其他因素，我并不认为这种做法违背了帝国的律法。”

languages.text: "Rotacılar, uğursuz varlığını İmparatorluk lehine çevirmenin bir yolunu buldu. Navis Nobilite'nin durumu ile diğer koşullar düşünülürse bunların hiçbiri, Lex İmperialis'e aykırı değil."
languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."

traits.locale_text: "Rotacılar, uğursuz varlığını İmparatorluk lehine çevirmenin bir yolunu buldu. Navis Nobilite'nin durumu ile diğer koşullar düşünülürse bunların hiçbiri, Lex İmperialis'e aykırı değil."

languages.original_text: "The Navigators found a way for the Imperium to benefit from your unholy existence. Taking into account the status of the Navis Nobilite and other circumstances, I would not consider this an offence against the Lex Imperialis."
